title: Canberra
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Malcolm Otton, John Milson and Donald Crombie
brief_description: Gives impressions of Australia’s national capital and the life of its inhabitants. Shows government buildings and other architectural features, but emphasises the merits of the pace of life, climate and scenery.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Malcolm Otton, John Milson and Donald Crombie
